dialogues.text: What the hell did you tell them, Jackson? DANIEL turns back to O'Neil, nervous and confused.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Try to communicate.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: How?  133 51. Frustrated O'Neil steps forward. He singles out one of th workers, a young boy, SKAARA, sixteen. Filled with fear, Skaara averts his eyes. O'Neil extends his hand. Skaara only looks at it with mounting fright. Frustrated, O'Neil GRABS Skaara's hand, shaking it. Skaara SCREAMS OUT in fear and takes off RUNNING. He runs as fast as he can until he disappears from view. O'Neil turns to Daniel, confused.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So much for communication. O'Neil shoots him a look. Behind them, Brown leans over one of the piles of mineral stacked nearby. He lowers a device over it, taking readin Kawalsky's attention is diverted to something far away. Noticing Kawalsky looking away, Daniel and O'Neil turn to SEE...

dialogues.speaker: DECORATED MASTADGE AND ENTOURAGE 133
dialogues.text: An elaborately decorated Mastadge with a covered carriage its back comes marching over through the gathered workers small entourage surrounding it as it moves. Among them, Skaara, who looks up to the carriage, speaking quickly. Slowly it makes its way through the crowd over to Daniel the others. It stops and an elderly man, KASUF, the tribe priest steps from the carriage. As he gets to the front of the crowd he KNEELS before Dan Kasuf begins to SPEAK in his language. His head bowed, Ka speaks very FAST and with reverence. Finally, when done, Kasuf STANDS again. This time the ENT CROWD stands with him, as though a prayer had ended. Dani looks at O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Don't look at me. Kasuf signals a group of WOMEN who approach carrying larg water basins. SARI, twenty, beautiful and painfully shy, steps forward and offers some water to Daniel. Her hair up in an Egyptian looking head covering looks li the spitting image of Daniel's Egyptian bust. Daniel is stunned, smitten. Slowly he accepts a drink. She humbly bows her head and then moves on to Kawalsky. Kasuf steps forward, again, speaking quickly. Asking a question.  52. Captivated by Sari, it takes Daniel a second to snap out it. He doesn't know how to respond. An idea hits him and he digs into his pocket and retrieves another Snickers Ba Daniel walks over to Kasuf, peeling the bar. He shows it Kasuf. Kasuf looks at it. He doesn't understand. Daniel takes a bite. In a ceremonial gesture, Daniel hands the bar over Kasuf who reluctantly takes it. Hesitantly, he takes a bi He likes the taste and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: KASUF
dialogues.text: Anaasar. Daniel is thrilled. He smiles back at him.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Anaasar. Pleased at communicating with Daniel, Kasuf waves his arm invitingly towards the direction from which he came.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He's inviting us to go with him.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: What makes you so sure? Daniel exaggeratedly repeats Kasuf's gesture.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Sign language. Everyone turns to the Colonel for a decision. He makes no He just stares at the departing Kasuf, considering.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Weren't we looking for signs of civilization? Obviously we've found it. You want me to get us back home? This is my best shot.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Colonel, he's right. I took some readings on what they're mining. It's the same material as the Star Gate. Looking at the faces of the mud covered workers, O'Neil finally makes a decision.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Give me the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind has kicked up. Feretti and another soldier strug to re-tie the main tent to a post.

dialogues.speaker: FREEMAN
dialogues.text: (yelling over) Feretti! I've got O'Neil on the radio. Feretti hurries over to Freeman.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: (into Mic) Yes, Sir... Worried, the remaining members of the team huddle close.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Can you repeat that Sir? (long pause) Okay, Sir. Yes, Sir. He hangs up, a strange look on his face. He turns to the men.

dialogues.speaker: FREEMAN
dialogues.text: Are they coming back? Feretti is reluctant to answer. Finally...

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: This is not good. I'm telling you guys, this is not good.

dialogues.speaker: LATE AFTERNOON 135
dialogues.text: Over the boundless sea of sand dunes we PAN DOWN an endle caravan of workers making their way across the desert. Ka leads the procession, our crew in tow.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND MASTADGE 136
dialogues.text: Daniel BLOWS his nose into a Kleenex, drawing strange loo from the workers. Daniel's attention, however, is on the beautiful Sari who walks across from him. Suddenly the Mastadge BUMPS Daniel playfully from behind. Daniel ignore it as he continues to gaze at Sari. The Mastadge does it again. Skaara, who holds the reins of th Mastadge, giggles at Daniel's plight.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (to Mastadge) Cut it out.  137 138 139 140 54. Scolded, the Mastadge NUZZLES the back of Daniel's neck t to make up. Daniel takes out the remainder of his last Snickers Bar and feeds it to the Mastadge who happily che it.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here. Now stop bugging me.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (turning back) I told you not to feed it. Now you'll never get rid of that stupid thing. Again, the Mastadge playfully BUMPS Daniel from behind.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: (to Brown) At least somebody likes him. Suddenly the convoy STOPS. Ahead, Kasuf stops and turns back towards Daniel, pointing off into the distance. As Daniel walks closer he can see...

dialogues.speaker: NAGADA
dialogues.text: The ancient village of the people of this planet set snug at the base of a rocky hillside. A huge settlement. Peopl milling around the gates surrounding it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The long caravan makes its way down into this valley. The town's people rush over to get a look at the strange gues of Kasuf.

dialogues.speaker: KASUF
dialogues.text: At the front of the convoy, Daniel and the team walk alon with Kasuf. The Mastadge still following behind. Suddenly Skaara, pulls the Mastadge away joining several other young SHEPHERD BOYS who corral the Mastadges. The Mastadge WHINES a cry of protest as he gets pulled away f Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passing through the enormous gates to the village, Daniel and the team are amazed at what they see. Hundreds of peo cram into these narrow streets to get a look at the visit As they reach the end of the street, they reach an elevat PLATFORM. Kasuf gives a signal and a curtain falls, revealing... 137 138 139 140  141 142 143 144 55.

dialogues.speaker: GOLDEN SUN DISK 141
dialogues.text: This Gold SUN DISK, two meters in diameter, hangs above t platform. Daniel is totally astonished.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: The sign of Ra, the Egyptian Sun God. (to O'Neil) They worship him. They must think he sent us here.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: What gave them that idea? Slowly Daniel lifts the Sun Disk hanging from his neck. A he does, all the workers surrounding them bow down. Even Kasuf kneels. O'Neil and his men exchange a worried look. Daniel stares up at the SUN DISK. We DISSOLVE to the imag of the planet's three SETTING SUNS, disappearing behind t dunes.

dialogues.speaker: BURST OF FLAME 142
dialogues.text: ignites in a FIREBALL. The SOUNDS of CHEERS followed by percussion instruments, primitive music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of women carrying trays of food pass. As we TRACK with them we SEE the entire town has come out for a CELEBRATION. We FOLLOW the women through the crowds over the platform where Daniel and the team sit with the town Elders. As the food arrives we SEE Sari, among the women, serving the people on the platform.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: (whispering) I don't think we should be eating anything.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: They might consider that an insult. Just then a TRAY is lowered before Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: A DESERT REPTILE 144
dialogues.text: A cooked beastie even Ethiopians wouldn't eat. Daniel loo like he's going to be sick.  145 56.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: You don't want to offend them, now do you, Jackson? Daniel looks at O'Neil, worried. In fact, no one on the team wants to eat. They all exchange nervous glances. Kas and the Elders turn, waiting for them to start.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go on, eat. Reluctantly Daniel leans over and takes a fleshy piece of slimy meat. He takes a deep breath, shuts his eyes, and eats it. Everyone stares at him. Finally after a long pau

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (chewing) Tastes like chicken.

dialogues.speaker: SARI 145
dialogues.text: kneels down next to Daniel, offering him some bread. For the first time he sees her with her hair down, looking al the more lovely. He just stares at her for a long awkward beat. Sari won't look directly at him. Daniel is complete enamored.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Jackson. Daniel just smiles stupidly at Sari. The Elders and Kasuf turn, noticing the interaction. They discuss it with interest.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jackson. Nervous and embarrassed, Sari hands him the bowl and retr The spell broken, Daniel turns back to O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (absently) Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (impatient) Do you think you can keep your mind on what we're here for?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Oh, I can't make it out. Their language sounds familiar, a bit like Berber, or maybe Chadic, or Omotic? I can't tell.  146 147 57.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (re: above disk) You said that was an Egyptian symbol.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Stands to reason, if they know one Egyptian symbol...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: ...they'1ll know more. Let me try. Daniel stands, walks before the town Elders. With everyon attention locked on Daniel, he kneels down in front of th Elders and begins to draw in the sand. The Elders lean forward to get a look. Daniel shows them quickly drawn hieroglyphic symbol. Instantly the Elders REACT, turning to each other, speaking quickly, obviously upset. Worried he's done the wrong thing. Daniel tries writing something else. The moment the drawing can be seen, the Elders instantly RETREAT, backing down off the platform, averting your eyes. The crowd begins to MURMUR. The Elders clearly distraught As Daniel tries to write something completely different, Kasuf rushes over and WIPES OUT the drawings in the sand.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: What's happening here, Jackson?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I don't know. Look how they're reacting. It's like... (turning back) ...writing is forbidden to them. Realizing their hope of finding the clue to the gate is g the team grows silent in despair. Suddenly through the restless sounds of the crowd we HEAR the echoing SOUND of HORN. Daniel looks up to SEE...

dialogues.speaker: A LOOKOUT 146
dialogues.text: Up top of the village a young LOOKOUT, lifts a small HORN and again sounds an ALARM that reverberates through the streets.

dialogues.speaker: STREET 147
dialogues.text: Reacting to the SOUND, the people quickly begin to gather belongings and disperse. Tables and cushions are DRAGGED AWAY. A cloth is DROPPED over the SUN DISK, covering it.  148 58. Doors are LOCKED, windows SHUT. Kawalsky and Brown rush to O'Neil and Daniel, nervous.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: What are they doing?

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Colonel, I don't like the looks of this... Before Brown can finish his thought, we SEE the two huge entrance doors at the end of the street begin TO CLOSE.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: We're getting out of here. Quickly O'Neil leads the team through the crowds, down th streets.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Why? Wait...! Ignored, the team continues without him. Daniel rushes to catch up. As the team moves down the street people REACH OUT, trying to STOP THEM. Knocked aside, the soldiers pus onward.

dialogues.speaker: FRONT ENTRANCE DOORS 148
dialogues.text: Just as they SHUT. Two YOUNG MEN rush over and LOCK it do with a crossbar. O'Neil moves quickly to the door, Kawals and Brown behind.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Open that door! O'Neil REACHES for the crossbar. One of the Young Men GRA his wrist. In lightning speed, O'Neil TWISTS the Young Ma arm behind his back and SLAMS him into the door. Quickly O'Neil DRAWS his pistol, shoving it into the side the Young Man's head. He SCREAMS OUT, but of course we ca understand him.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: No, don't! Kasuf and the Elders push through the crowd. Sari watches from the side, apprehensive. Skaara and the shepherd boys across from her, are glued to the action, peering through the mob. As the crowd moves closer, O'Neil aims his pistol high an FIRES. Kawalsky and Brown lift their weapons, ready for a Fight. The crowd quickly retreats. Skaara is AMAZED.  149 150 151 152 59. The crowd remains silent, frightened they've upset the Go O'Neil holds the Young Man tight. A standoff. Suddenly Brown's radio SQUELCHES ON. Brown lifts it to hi ear, listening.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Sir, I can't make this out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge SAND STORM blasts around the men who try to pack w they can as they retreat from base camp. Feretti holds th radio, yelling into it on the move. The tents tear apart behind them.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: ...we have to abandon base camp. I repeat... Feretti ushers his men onward as he fights his way through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil presses the radio close to his ear. Only every thi word is heard through the intense static.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (yelling into com) Feretti, I can't hear you. Say again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through a wall of white sand, shapes appear, rushing towa us. As we DOLLY BACK, we SEE that the team has reached th safety of the pyramid entrance. They collapse from exhaustion.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: (into radio) Do you copy? Do you copy? But only loud STATIC can be heard. Feretti turns to the nervous faces of the other soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frustrated, O'Neil gives up, shuts the radio off.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Damn it. The crowd still stares intently. Kawalsky and Brown hold their guns at the ready. Suddenly O'Neil feels a TUG at h shirt; Skaara, the young shepherd boy. O'Neil SPINS towards him. Skaara backs off quickly. Movin over to a ladder, he motions for O'Neil to follow him.  153 154 60. O'Neil looks over to Daniel who can only shrug.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Kawalsky) Stay here. O'Neil follows Skaara.

dialogues.speaker: TOP OF THE NAGADA GATE
dialogues.text: Skaara reaches the top and moves to the side. O'Neil foll His face registers an important sight.

dialogues.speaker: SAND STORM 154
dialogues.text: Moving quickly we SEE a WALL OF SAND moving towards the t

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Sir, what is it?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Sand storm. Coming this way.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Well, that would have been an excellent reason to shoot everyone. Daniel moves over to the two soldiers, forcing them to lo their guns. Daniel turns back to Kasuf, attempting to sig the tension is over. Kasuf nods and calls out to the back of the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (yelling down) We'll stay 'til the storm is over. Brown and Kawalsky exchange a look. A commotion behind th they turn to SEE a group of ELDERLY WOMEN push their way through the crowd over to Daniel, surrounding him placing shawl over his shoulders. They giggle as they slowly pull surprised Daniel down the street. The crowd laughs as they depart, moving to shelter. The only one not laughing is Sari who watches Daniel pass. Da yells back to O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Should I go with them? I could stay... I'll go. It'll be fine. The women begin to toss strange POWDER over Daniel's head they enter a building down the street. Kawalsky leans clo to Brown.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: I hope they cook him.  155 156 157 158 159 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sand storm has hit full force. We can barely make out the entrance to the pyramid through the murky sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feretti shields his eyes as he stands in the doorway look out at the storm. The image of the moon scarcely pierces through the whirling sand. Feretti turns and walks back into the main entrance hall.

dialogues.speaker: MOON ABOVE PYRAMID
dialogues.text: Just as we saw in the opening, a SHADOW is cast across th moon, blotting it out. Something moves in the sky above t storm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feretti walks over to the group of soldiers who surround radio.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: (into radio) This is base. Do you read?

dialogues.speaker: FREEMAN
dialogues.text: You're wasting the batteries. Feretti shuts off the radio and places his helmet over it

dialogues.speaker: FREEMAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're not going to get anything during this storm. We'll try again after it passes.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: If it passes. I was stationed in the Middle East and I've never seen anything like it. I'm telling you guys, this is not good. There is a silent moment. Suddenly they all hear the SOUN of RATTLING METAL. They turn and SEE Feretti's helmet SHA against the radio. Slowly Freeman removes the helmet, the radio jostling underneath. Suddenly the FLARE BOXES begin to SHAKE. Soon, all their equipment begins to RATTLE. Suddenly the ENTIRE ROOM begins to rumble. An eerie, unnatural HUM begins to grow in volume. The men exchange worried glances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above the intense storm a SHAPE begins to take FORM, loom above us. The ROAR intensifying.  160 161 162 163 164 165

dialogues.speaker: 165A
dialogues.text: 166 62. The SHAPE begins to pierce through the turbulence. We can SEE it's some kind of alien OBJECT. BRIGHT LIGHTS darting off its sides as it grows near. As the cloudy sand is BLOWN away, we can clearly see it's pyramid shaped SPACE CRAFT. Landing ARMS extending as it LOWERS itself down over the TOP OF THE PYRAMID.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is now SHAKING violently. Frightened, the men gr their weapons. They have no idea what's happening. Quickl they group together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ARMS of the craft LOCK into place as the craft FITS i onto the peak of the pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the IMPACT, the Soldiers are KNOCKED off their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once in place, the craft begins to OPEN, UNFOLDING and exposing the technical details of the craft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the Star Gate seen in the background, we can SEE a t LASER tracing the outline of the MEDALLION on the floor. Something is happening, igniting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their guns pointed in every direction, the men are huddle together, ready for a fight.

dialogues.speaker: FREEMAN
dialogues.text: (yelling over roar) What the hell is happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the center of the room we SEE a large SARCOPHAGUS, its side slowly LOWERING, revealing the figure of a MAN who l inside.

dialogues.speaker: SHAKING
dialogues.text: Moving swiftly down the dark corridors of the interior of the pyramid, we MOVE towards the unsuspecting Soldiers ah of us. As we NEAR, one of the Soldiers SPOTS US, lifting his wea Quickly the others SPIN, taking aim at us.  167 168 169 170 63. But we keep coming at them. At the same time they FIRE, b NOTHING CAN STOP US. We move directly into Freeman's SCREAMING FACE. Suddenly we FLASH CUT onto...

dialogues.speaker: ANUBIS
dialogues.text: A Jackal headed creature, in our face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sand storm continues to surround the village.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seated on a stool in the middle of the room, Daniel is be by the Elderly town's women who fuss over him with wash c and combs. Completely uncomfortable, Daniel tries to be polite and endure as much as he can. But when the women begin to wash his ears and nose, Danie shakes them off.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. Thank you. That's enough. Alright. The Elderly women retreat, bowing and giggling as they ex his room. Finally gone, Daniel breathes a sigh of relief. Suddenly he HEARS some WHISPERING. He turns back towards the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The curtains rustle, then part. Sari steps through dresse in a CEREMONIAL ROBE. She walks into the chamber towards Daniel. Nervous, Daniel gets to his feet, his heart in his throat As she makes her way closer to Daniel, she unties her rob letting it FALL to the floor, revealing her beautiful NAK BODY. She stares at the floor, sadly.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What..? Uh... no. Daniel rushes over, picking up her robe.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't... that's not necessary. He wraps the robe back around her, covering her. She does understand. She looks at him, scared she's displeased him  171 172 64.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's not that I... I mean... you're beautiful but... uh... Realizing she can't understand, Daniel gently turns her b towards the entrance, tenderly escorting her. At the curt he turns to her.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. You should go. Her eyes fill with tears. Daniel opens the curtains for h to leave, revealing...

dialogues.speaker: THE TOWN'S ELDERS 171
dialogues.text: All gathered just outside his chamber, crowding the bridg between the buildings. Daniel stares out at the unexpecte ensemble. Kasuf looks over at Sari, sees her tears and sp angrily to her. Sari is frightened and in trouble. Daniel realizing this, suddenly SMILES and WAVES to the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Just wanted to say... (for lack of better) ...thanks. Thank you very much. Daniel waves and bows as he escorts Sari BACK into his chamber. Quickly he SHUTS the curtains behind him. Now Sari is totally confused. Again she starts to disrobe.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No, no, that's okay. Again, Daniel gently stops her, motioning for her to sit down on the sleeping mat. She does. He crosses the room and sits down a safe distance away.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Looks like you've got a roommate for the night. There is a long embarrassing pause as the two sit in awkw silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brown and Kawalsky sit next to the radio. Brown readjusts the dials. Kawalsky stares at O'Neil who stands at the wi on the other side of the room.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: (whispered to Brown) O'Neil seem strange to you? (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The way he's taking all this. Like, no big deal.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Maybe he knows something we don't.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL 173
dialogues.text: O'Neil' stands by the window, watching the storm. Unseen, Skaara enters through the doorway. Spotting O'Neill's holstered pistol laying on the mattress, Skaara slowly cr towards the gun. Just as he reaches for it...

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: No! Dangerous. Somehow Skaara understands. Quickly he backs off. O'Neil pulls out a pack of cigarettes, lights one. As the lighte ignites, Skaara jumps to his feet, frightened.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's okay. It's just a lighter. O'Neil tosses the lighter to Skaara. He lights it over an over again. Skaara takes one of O'Neil's cigarettes out o the pack on the bed, lights it, mimicking O'Neil. O'Neil casts a sidelong glance at the boy. He sits down a leans his head back against the wall. Skaara does the sam thing. Beat. O'Neil flicks the ash of his cigarette. Skaa copies his every move. Skaara and O'Neil sit there for a moment. Skaara's starti to feel pretty confident by this point. O'Neil sees this. He takes a deep drag off his cigarette and audibly INHALE deeply, exhaling a cloud of smoke. Feeling cocky, Skaara imitates O'Neil. The minute the smo reaches his lungs, his eyes go wide, then fill with tears He starts COUGHING his guts up. O'Neil suppresses a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neither has moved. There's another awkward pause. Finally Daniel smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I'm Daniel... Daniel. Sari points to herself, repeats Daniel.  175 66.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Dan-el.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: No, er, me. Daniel. Sari gets it, points to Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Dan-el.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Yes. Daniel. There's a long pause. Slowly Sari points to herself.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Sari.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Sari, yes. There is another awkward pause.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We came from the pyramid. She doesn't understand. Daniel kneels down and DRAWS a pyramid in the sand covered floor. Again, Sari only stare at it. Daniel grows frustrated and walks to the window. Sari keeps staring at the drawing. She reaches over and draws something over it. Slowly Daniel turns back, curious to see Sari augmenting drawing. He moves close to see she's drawn a circle and a line abo the pyramid; the same symbol Daniel discovered on the tab

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That's the sign for Earth! You know this symbol? She looks back up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the Mastadges in the background, all the shepherd BO are surrounding Skaara who holds O'Neil's lighter for eve to see, the wind from the storm continuing to HOWL outsid Suddenly Skaara LIGHTS the lighter. The boys JUMP BACK in fear. Skaara laughs as the boys re-approach to examine the ligh Suddenly there is a BANGING SOUND. Skaara turns and sees Daniel's Mastadge, banging his head against the corral do  176 177 178 179 180 181 67.

dialogues.speaker: MASTADGE 176
dialogues.text: As Skaara walks over and calms the Mastadge down he SEES what the Mastadge was reacting to...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND SARI 177
dialogues.text: Moving down the street, disappearing between the building

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A torch in her hand, Sari leads Daniel over to the end of small street at the side of the village. Behind a stairwell, she shows Daniel a large boulder lean against the wall. She tries to PUSH IT. Daniel helps her and together they move it away from the wall revealing a small TUNNEL. Sari checks to see if they've been observed. The coast cl Sari ducks inside. Daniel follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They crawl beneath the structure through the dirt reachin hidden set of STAIRS leading downward. Sari points down t stairs. Daniel takes the torch and walks down, Sari following. Eroded and musty walls surround the stairs. Daniel makes to the bottom of the stairs that lead directly to a dirt covered WALL. The SYMBOL for Earth engraved in its center Astonished, Daniel runs his fingers around the surroundin wall. His finger PUSHES THROUGH some dirt, until he's abl to dig out the archway surrounding the symbol; he uncover DOOR. Realizing it's a door, Daniel is able to dig into the doo giving him something to grip. He PULLS with all his might Slowly the door OPENS. Sari's eyes go wide. Daniel is nervous but excited. Cautiously they make their way through the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the door we find the long narrow ancient catacombs obviously built centuries ago. Daniel holds his torch up the walls revealing...

dialogues.speaker: HIEROGLYPHICS AND DRAWINGS 181
dialogues.text: Covering every bit of wall space, all the way down this n passage way. Daniel turns to Sari, stunned. Sari, too, ha never seen any of this. She's frightened. Daniel continue down the wall, trying to make sense out of this picture s  68.

dialogues.speaker: PICTURE STORY 182
dialogues.text: AS we move down the wall we see... the now familiar symbo for Earth... then ANIMAL HEADED warriors (Anubis, Horus, Thoth)... taking children... families ripped apart. Daniel and Sari lean close. The images disturbing, harsh. They move the torch down the wall. The next drawings depict... slaves herded together... the warriors brutalizing them... shepherding them across the desert over to... THE STAR GATE. Alongside these pictures, Daniel SEES the first of some hieroglyphic symbols.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: The symbol for slavery... seama!

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: (correcting) Seema? Surprised, he turns to Sari.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (pointing to symbol) Semer?

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Seema.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Seema! Quickly Daniel rushes over to another symbol, pointing.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Nefer? Sari wrinkles her brow, she doesn't understand. She walks over, close, staring uncomprehendingly at the symbol. Dan tries another pronunciation.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Nefeer?

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: (correcting) Nefaar?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Nefaar! Yes! Teach me to speak. Teach... um... Takera.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Takeer?  183 184 185 186 187 69. Daniel smiles. Frightened, she returns it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last dust of the sand storm is settling. The night is soon over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil stands over Brown who works the radio.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: More interference?

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: No. They're simply not there.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Colonel! O'Neil walks out of the room, onto the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY IN STREET
dialogues.text: Kawalsky comes rushing down the street.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jackson's not in his room. I can't find him anywhere. Kawalsky holds up Daniel's jacket.

dialogues.speaker: MASTADGE CORRAL
dialogues.text: Skaara and the other shepherd boys work the corral. Skaar turns, looking down the street he SEES O'Neil meeting up with Kawalsky.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY AND O'NEIL
dialogues.text: O'Neil takes Daniel's jacket from him.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: We've lost radio contact. Get Brown. Find Daniel. I want to leave as soon as possible.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Yes, Sir. Kawalsky salutes as he takes off. Skaara watching from th corral, practices a salute. 183 184 185 186 187  188 189 70. Just then O'Neil turns, spots him and marches over.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: I'm looking for Jackson... Of course they can't understand a word. O'Neil holds up Daniel's jacket.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jackson, see. Jackson. They don't get it at all. Instead they suddenly all begin to SALUTE. O'Neil is not good at this and he knows it.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jackson. Uh, like this. Jackson. O'Neil forms circles with his hands and holds them over h eyes imitating GLASSES. The boys copy his movement, holdi their cupped hands over their eyes. They all giggle.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No. I mean... Adding the final touch, O'Neil SNEEZES. Suddenly Skaara REALIZES. He runs over to O'Neil and SNATCHES the jacket away from him. He rushes off with it across the corral. Skaara holds it up to the nose of Daniel's Mastadge. Sudd the Mastadge REARS UP, ROARING. Quickly Skaara opens the corral gate and the Mastadge RACES out. Coming around the corner, Kawalsky and Brown have to LEAP out of the way as the Mastadge charges past.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Smart kid.

dialogues.speaker: BLACK SCREEN 188
dialogues.text: Until the flickering light of a torch is moved into frame Now we see printed on a wall the drawings of... a YOUNG B bathed in light from a pyramid above him... the boy adorn in PHARAOHS CLOTHING, the animal headed warriors bowing t him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel moves the torch slowly over the wall. To our surpr he says something to Sari in her own language. She respon in kind.  71.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I thought you couldn't speak their language. Daniel SPINS, his torch illuminating O'NEIL who stands be him, Skaara at his side. Startled, Daniel has to catch hi breath.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: It's ancient Egyptian. I just didn't know how to pronounce it. No one has heard it spoken in over two thousand years.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Jackson, what is all this? Behind him we SEE Kawalsky and Brown roaming through, fascinated by what they see.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: A history of the people who first came to this world. Daniel turns back to the tableau on the wall, pointing to it.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look, here, this is Ra, the God these people worship. He was a young boy, taken by people from distant stars who turned him into a God. He points to the drawings of the boy becoming a Pharaoh.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Once a God, Ra betrayed his own people, enslaving them to serve his masters. Daniel points to a series of drawings of Ra, ruling his people. O'Neil suddenly becomes very interested. Slowly we PUSH I close as we study O'Neil's intense curiosity.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They taught him how to build the great pyramid of Giza. They gave him eternal life. They made him ruler of all mankind. And in return he gave them...people. Daniel stops reading, turning back to O'Neil.  190 191 72.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Workers for the mines. He sold out man in order to be a God. O'Neil looks concerned, lost in thought. There is a pregn pause as he takes this all in.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Jackson, I think you better take a look at this. At the end of the corridor, Kawalsky steps out, holding a flash light.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER CORRIDOR 190
dialogues.text: Daniel, O'Neil and Sari join Kawalsky and Brown who stare awe at something before them...

dialogues.speaker: ALTAR 191
dialogues.text: Enshrined in sacred writings, this whole section is dedic to a single cartouche at the wall's center, half buried i the sand. We recognise the cartouche as the same one we s on the tablets. Daniel rushes over to it, examining, digging out the cove portion of the cartouche. The others crowd in behind him, anxious, tense.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: They must have kept it here in hopes that one day the gate to Earth could be reopened. These definitely match the signs on the Star Gate. But as Daniel's hand moves down the six main SYMBOLS, we discove the last piece of the cartouche has BROKEN OFF.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (panicked) Where's the seventh sign? Frantically Daniel digs in the dirt looking for something Realizing what he is doing, the team drops to the ground, digging. Sari, not understanding, holds the torch.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I think I got it! He pulls a piece of fractured wall out of the dirt. It FI in perfectly with the cartouche, but the piece is WORN CL The SYMBOL IS GONE. Daniel and the soldiers are STUNNED. Their hopes of retur home, dashed. Probably forever. O'Neil gets a determined look in his eye. He turns, making his way out.  192 193 194 195 196 73.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: We're heading back.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: But it won't work without the last symbol. O'Neil doesn't even look back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sand pours through as the front gates to Nagada open. O'N leads our team as they march out through the gates. At th back of the pack, Daniel trails behind, looking back over his shoulder. We CRANE UP to the bridge above the gate just as Sari com rushing over. She stops at the top of the gate, staring a the men as they depart.

dialogues.speaker: TEAM
dialogues.text: With new resolve, O'Neil marches ahead. There's something different about him now. An adamant look in his eye.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Hurry up, Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Forget him. He's useless to us now. Surprised Kawalsky looks over at Brown who can only shrug Behind them Daniel looks back at Sari.

dialogues.speaker: SARI 194
dialogues.text: AS we PULL BACK away from her. Sadly, she watches him dep

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silhouetted against the rising sun we see the lonely imag of the team walking across the dunes. Indefatigable, O'Ne presses on. Kawalsky wipes his brow as Brown takes a swig from his canteen. Daniel catches up with them and reaches out for a drink b Brown pulls it away. Kawalsky turns, spotting something.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: Skaara and the shepherd boys come rushing up over the dun Playfully wanting to join up with them.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Sir, I think you made some friends.  197 198 199 200 74. O'Neil turns and sees them.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Jackson, get rid of them. O'Neil presses onward as Daniel tells them to leave, but they follow regardless. O'Neil looks back.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I said, get rid of Гўв‚¬Лњem!

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I tried. O'Neil STOPS, draws his pistol and FIRES towards the Boys his bullets RIPPING into the sand in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ! The Boys jump back, tumbling down the sand. Quickly they retreat behind a dune.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You didn't have to do that! O'Neil simply turns and marches on. Even Kawalsky and Bro are shocked. As the team disappears over the next dune...

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA 197
dialogues.text: pokes his head back up from behind the last dune. Hurt an betrayed, Skaara sadly watches the team walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several yards ahead of the team, O'Neil continues, undaun Together they climb a STEEP DUNE. As they near the top th SEE O'Neil suddenly DROP to his knees. Reacting, the soldiers rush up the hill. Daniel, not understanding, hurries to catch them. Turning back, Kawal waves for him to drop. Daniel does, crawling to meet them

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0O.V.
dialogues.text: As Daniel clears the top of the dune we REVEAL the Pyrami with the SPACE CRAFT perched on top.

dialogues.speaker: PYRAMID SPACE CRAFT 200
dialogues.text: For the first time we can clearly see the breadth of this amazing vessel, ornate and technical at the same time. Unfolded, the craft nearly covers the entire pyramid it s on. The team stares in awe.  201 202 203 75. There's a long pause. O'Neil lifts a small pair of binocu and SEES the half buried base camp, destroyed and abandon Suddenly O'Neil SNAPS a clip into his rifle.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Lieutenant, I've got to get to the StarGate at all costs. Cover me.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: But Sir... Suddenly O'Neil TAKES OFF, scurrying down the dunes, maki his way to the pyramid entrance.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Shit! Jackson, stay close.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: What is happening here? Kawalsky throws his rifle to Daniel, drawing his pistol. Daniel is totally confused.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Ready? Nervously, Brown nods. Kawalsky TAKES OFF after O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil has taken a position behind the obelisks. He sees the team making their way down. He waves them on towards the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA AND SHEPHERD BOYS 202
dialogues.text: Climbing up behind another dune, they spy down the hill a O'Neil as he moves towards the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil takes cover next to the entrance door meeting up w the rest of the squad.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Two teams. Lieutenant, you and Brown take the rear. O'Neil darts inside. Daniel doesn't know what to do.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Go! Daniel follows O'Neil.  204 205 206 207 208 209 210 211 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Column by column, O'Neil makes his way down the large ent hall. Clumsily Daniel hauls the rifle behind. As they ent they SEE Feretti's radio, the helmet, assorted equipment. Daniel swallows hard. Behind them, Kawalsky and Brown creep down the opposite r of columns, weapons ready. Just as they pass we see a SHA move across the wall behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shepherd boys sneak up the side of the structure. Ska creeps up a dune over to a small window.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND O'NEIL 206
dialogues.text: Pressed against a column. O'Neil moves forward, choosing his path. Daniel looks back, something MOVES. He leans th opposite direction just in time to SEE...

dialogues.speaker: SHADOW 207
dialogues.text: A huge shadow, human form but with a HAWK-LIKE HEAD. Dani reacts, turns to O'Neil but O'Neil is GONE. Scared, Danie grips the rifle tight.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN 208
dialogues.text: Brown steps out from behind a column when WHACK, somethin hits him across the head, SPINNING HIM. As he recovers BL a strange POWER BURST to his shoulder, SLAMMING HIM again the post.

dialogues.speaker: WINDOW
dialogues.text: Peering in through a window we SEE Skaara straining to se inside.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: Writhing in pain, Brown screams as Horus SLAMS the rear o his weapon into him. Skaara's eyes go wide with fear as h retreats to tell the others.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL 211
dialogues.text: Spins, sees something and LEAPS out of the way as a POWER BURST EXPLODES into the column behind him. Kawalsky JUMPS out FIRING. Out of nowhere his weapon is SMASHED, knocked out of his hand. He spins, his eyes wide as he SEES...  212 213 214 215 77.

dialogues.speaker: HORUS 212
dialogues.text: Body of a man, the head, a metallic textured sculpture of HAWK. He SWINGS his weapon at Kawalsky who grabs hold wit all his strength. Kawalsky grapples with Horus who TWISTS his weapon free, then SMASHES it into Kawalsky's chest. Holding his rifle tentatively, Daniel steps out from behi a column just in time to SEE... Kawalsky SAILS across the hallway, SLAMMING into a column, collapsing in a heap. Ju then Daniel SEES Horus crossing the hallway, moving in on Kawalsky. Daniel is in total shock, his eyes wide with fear. Standi out there, he's a sitting duck. Suddenly a HAND reaches f him and GRABS HIM, yanking him back to safety.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL 213
dialogues.text: Holds Daniel tight against the wall, leaning close to his face.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Cover me.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Wha...? O'Neil makes a DASH for the door leading to the StarGate. Daniel gathers his strength and follows, attempting to co the rear as he runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FLARE tumbles towards us, O'Neil rushing up from behind In the flickering light we see Daniel, stumbling after O' trying to keep his rifle pointed to the rear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The darkness is broken with another FLARE as it rolls tow us. O'Neil rushes through the Medallion room straight ove to the wheeled vehicle standing next to the StarGate. Dan races in, moving over towards O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (scolding) Get back to the door!

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: What about Kawalsky and Brown?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: You heard me, move! Daniel reluctantly moves over towards the medallion, aimi his gun into the Grand Gallery.  216 217 78. O'Neil retrieves the electric KEY from his pocket. He tur a dial and a RED LIGHT begins to FLASH.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: I said cover me, Goddamnit! O'Neil takes out the tool and opens the secret compartmen of the vehicle only to find it EMPTY. O'Neil is in total SHOCK.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's gone! Pissed and scared, Daniel turns back to O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: What is? Just as Daniel turns a LASER traces the edges of the MEDA on the floor. A BEAM appears just as the image of a man MATERIALIZES behind Daniel's back. Fully realized, we see it's ANUBIS, his weapon aimed. O'Neil looks up and SEES Anubis. Slowly he lifts his arms in surrender. Seeing this Daniel SPINS, his rifle shaking in nervous hands.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (suddenly calm) Jackson, put it down. Anubis steps into the flickering light of the flare. For the first time we can SEE the details of this strange creature. Stepping close, he runs his palm beneath his weapon and t barrel SNAPS OPEN ready to fire. Daniel lowers his rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the medallion below, a laser traces the floor, illuminating this dark room. Once surrounding the medalli SHAPES begin to form. Soon we SEE it's O'Neil, Daniel and Anubis. The beam VANISHES and a circular door SLIDES open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the door opens we find HORUS waiting. He and Anubis le Daniel and O'Neil into the room. Suddenly a loud SOUND is heard and the wall before them slowly begins to PART.  218 219 220 221 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly the top of the pyramid begins to OPEN UP, the plan three suns behind it. The paneling slides back revealing the palace beneath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They march down the center of this beautiful palace room. Light begins to STREAM IN from the openings above. They reach the far wall of the room and Horus THROWS Daniel to the floor. O'Neil SPINS, ready to fight.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (stage whisper) Kneel. Reluctantly O'Neil turns and bows down to his knees. Dani looks up from the ground and sees A GOLDEN SUN DISK adorn the wall before him. From all around SUNLIGHT pours in, bathing Daniel and O'N in bright light. As the light reaches the SUN DISK, the doors in front of them SLIDE OPEN revealing another room. Standing in front of a large set of stairs leading to a platform, we SEE a dozen human CHILDREN, ranging from 9 t 17 years of age, elaborately dressed, huddled together, blocking our view. Slowly they peel away from the center revealing...

dialogues.speaker: PHARAOH KING RA 220
dialogues.text: Perched on his throne, adorned with jewels and headdress like an ancient Pharaoh, RA looks like a living version o the mask of Tutankhamun, part humanoid, part other worldl Daniel and O'Neil, who look up at the strange creature be them. There is a long awkward silence as Ra examines them from his perch. Turning away, Ra lifts his hand, pointing to Anubis.

dialogues.speaker: ANUBIS 221
dialogues.text: touches a switch on the collar of his outfit and suddenly the Jackal head MORPS into the cold but handsome face of HUMAN, the real man behind the mask. Ra turns towards Horus, who also begins to CHANGE SHAPE. His Hawk mask peeling back to reveal the MAN underneath; dark skinned North African with joyless eyes. Neither O'Neil nor Daniel can believe their own eyes as t creatures unmask before them. Daniel nervously looks up towards Ra. After a long beat Ra gives a nod to the child  222 80. Two young BOYS walk up from behind Ra carrying a tray. O'Neil's DEVICE, stolen from the wheeled vehicle, lays dismantled on the tray. The children place it in front of Daniel and O'Neil. Daniel stares at it confused. O'Neil only stares at Ra defiantly. Daniel notices the English words and numbers printed around the device. He turns to O'Neil, bewildered

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (whispered) What is that? O'Neil only continues his glare to Ra. Daniel begins to panic, his mind racing.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That's what you were looking for. What you couldn't find... Daniel looks back to Ra who stares down at them, cold. Turning back to the device, Daniel starts to realize what he's looking at.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (incredulous) ...you were going to destroy this place!? Why? Suddenly Ra STANDS. As we PUSH IN we SEE...

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: Suddenly Ra's entire shape begins to MORPH, his image shi and changing. His golden skin PEELS AWAY as his headdress RETRACTS behind his head, revealing a BEAUTIFUL YOUNG MAN/CHILD, RA. Though ten thousand years have passed, he looks but slightly older than when we saw him in the film opening. As Ra is unveiled, Horus and Anubis BOW their heads. Seei this from the corner of his eye, O'Neil seizes the opportunity. He POPS UP, throwing a shoulder into Anubis' chest, wresting his weapon from him. He SLAMS Anubis with the butt end, knocking him to the floor. In one swift move, he copies the gesture he saw Anubis ma and SNAPS the weapon OPEN and FIRES at Horus, catching hi in the shoulder, SPINNING HIM to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (panicked) No! Don't! Stop it! But O'Neil TURNS, takes quick aim and FIRES at Ra. Just a the power blast leaves the weapon a CLEAR SHIELD forms ar Ra. The power blast is DEFLECTED.  223 224 225 226 227 228 81. Horus grabs his weapon, spins. Daniel steps between them, screaming out to them in their language. But, too date, | Horus FIRES. The blast RIPS INTO DANIEL KILLING HIM. second BLAST hits O'Neil in the shoulder, cutting into hi O'Neil hits the floor, writhing in intense pain. Ra steps down from his throne. He walks towards Anubis, retrieving his fallen weapon. For a moment we think he ma kill him. Instead he THROWS the weapon at him. Ra walks over to Daniel, staring down at his lifeless bod when something catches his eye. Ra kneels down, reaches over and touches the SUN DISK around Daniel's neck.

dialogues.speaker: SUN DISK
dialogues.text: Hanging from Daniel's neck, Ra fingers the golden sun dis examining it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly Daniel's Mastadge appears behind a dune and HOWLS, single beautiful note of pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buried in the sand, an exposed tent flap is PULLED aside the Shepherd boys SEE Daniel's Mastadge appearing behind them. They turn back, digging for more treasure. Skaara uncover one of the soldier's HELMETS. He shows it to the other bo Just then a LOUD HUM is heard. The Boys look up to SEE...

dialogues.speaker: GLIDER BAY
dialogues.text: The Glider bay OPENS and two GLIDERS shoot out into the s

dialogues.speaker: SHEPHERD BOYS
dialogues.text: The Boys DUCK for cover under the tent as the two Gliders SAIL past, disappearing from view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A square HOLE in the ceiling OPENS as the bars that cover recede. Unconscious, O'Neil body DROPS through, landing with a SPLASH into the shallow muddy water of this cell. The cold water reviving him, O'Neil BOLTS up awakened. Suddenly two arms GRAB HIM. Still in shock, O'Neil tries shake free. Finally he realises it's Kawalsky holding him

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Colonel, are you alright? 223 224 225 226 227 228  229 230 231 232 233 234 82. Adjusting to the dark room O'Neil SEES, Feretti and Freem SHIVERING at the back of the room. Between them two BODIE float face down in the murky waters.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sir? O'Neil only nods.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And Jackson?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: He's dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shepherd boys return from the pyramid, the Mastadge w them, packages strapped to its sides. Suddenly a SOUND is heard. The boys STOP as they SEE...

dialogues.speaker: TWO WINGED GLIDERS 230
dialogues.text: Heading right at them, darting out from over the dunes.

dialogues.speaker: SHEPHERD BOYS 231
dialogues.text: Sailing overhead we see the small group of boys staring u at us, astounded at what they see. Just as it passes over they get a mere glimpse at ANUBIS as he peers down at the Once gone, the boys race to the top of the dune to see wh the Gliders have just left; Nagada, a black plume of smok rising from the center of the town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys approach the front gates, entering the town slow From their expressions we SEE they are shocked at what th find.

dialogues.speaker: SHEPHERD BOYS' P.0O.V.
dialogues.text: People crying, comforting one another. Charred buildings, small flame being extinguished. Wounded people getting te to. Misery. The boys move slowly down the center of the street, fear anger in their eyes. Skaara sees Sari crying at the side the street. He rushes to her.

dialogues.speaker: SARI 234
dialogues.text: As Skaara approaches, Sari lifts her head and we SEE a CU above her eye, blood dripping down her face.  235 236 237 238 239 240 83. Skaara looks at her, wanting to understand. Sari only loo up. Skaara follows her gaze to SEE...

dialogues.speaker: KASUF
dialogues.text: Strapped to the Sun Disk we SEE Kasuf suspended above, be barely conscious. We PUSH into Skaara's troubled face, te and anger well in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silent and still, the sarcophagus sits at the back of the room. Slowly we MOVE closer to it just as its sides begin to retract, exposing a FIGURE covered in wet cloth laying motionless. As the sarcophagus completes this process the figure sudd SITS UP, frantically GASPING for air. Coughing, the figur rips off the wet cloth, revealing...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL 237
dialogues.text: Reborn. Daniel struggles to regain normal breathing. Fina he calms down and looks around to see where he is.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: Daniel scans the quiet, eerie room. He's startled as he SEES a young seven year old BOY standing in the doorway. Emotionless and completely still, the Boy stares at Danie Slowly Daniel gets to his feet, attempting to regain his balance. Once up, the Boy turns and walks out of the room Daniel is unsure if he should follow. Suddenly the Boy ST turns back, staring at Daniel. Daniel takes a step toward him and the Boy continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several yards ahead of him, the Boy leads Daniel down thi immense and imposing hallway. Daniel follows, disorientat his eyes scanning the room. He sees a CAT cross his path. Surprised, Daniel continues down and he sees ANOTHER cat, perched on a short flight of stairs. Still walking forwar Daniel turns back towards the Boy, only to find he's GONE Daniel looks ahead and sees another doorway. Assuming the Boy went through, Daniel cautiously follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly Daniel enters. He pushes his way through thin silk veils which hang down from the ceiling. Daniel moves thro them until he SEES...  241 242 84.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: Ra sits in his ornate sunken bath. Daniel watches him for long beat. Sensing his presence, Ra ignores Daniel, signa to the children who come, carrying his long robe. Holding it before him, Ra walks out of the bath, into his robe, passing Daniel on his way out. Daniel turns to him and speaks.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) I died. Surprised Daniel can speak his language, Ra stops and tur towards him. A subtle smile crosses Ra's lips. He then turns away and exits the room. Reluctantly, Daniel follow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra leads Daniel across the room past a long marble table. On which are the recovered belongings of the soldiers displayed; guns, books, radio and the dismantled bomb. Ra turns back to Daniel, studies his reaction for a long bea Finally...

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) You people have advanced much since I left. Your world has become. ..dangerous. Realizing the implication, Daniel gets nervous

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) What are you going to do?

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Tomorrow we will send the quartz to my masters. I will include all I have discovered. Off Daniel's frightened expression, Ra smiles as he walks away.

dialogues.speaker: RA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) It will be up to them to decide. Moving over to a sitting area, Ra is met by the children bring his clothing over to him and start to dress him. Da moves over towards him.  243 85.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Why did you give me back my life?

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) I need you. Daniel doesn't understand.

dialogues.speaker: RA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) You must restore...faith.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Faith? Ra nods to one of his children who pulls out a small tray Daniel's Sun Disk laying on top. Ra takes it, holds it.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) There can only be one Ra. He hands the Sun Disk back to Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: RA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) You will obey me before my people. They will witness as you kill your companions. Dressed, Ra stands and walks away from Daniel. Taking it all in, Daniel thinks to himself for a beat. Finally...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) And I refuse? Daniel turns back to Ra only to find Anubis standing behi him, lifting his weapon. Ra turns back to Daniel to see i he understands. He does.

dialogues.speaker: TOWARDS CURTAINS 243
dialogues.text: We MOVE through darkness towards long hanging fabric. As PUSH through the fabric into BRIGHT LIGHT we see THOUSAND OF PEOPLE gathered before us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil and the other prisoners are PUSHED out onto the platform, led by HORUS down to the center of the ramp. Using his weapon as a staff, Horus KNOCKS the soldiers do to their knees. He leaves them there as he marches back u to the top of the ramp, joined by another Horus (#2).

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Moving through the dense crowd, straining to see if Danie is on the ramp. Unable to spot him, she's crestfallen.

dialogues.speaker: TWO WINGED GLIDERS
dialogues.text: Two winged Gliders hover above the platform.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND ANUBIS
dialogues.text: With his mask in place, Anubis steps through the hanging fabric, Daniel close to his side. O'Neil looks up, comple shocked to discover Daniel still alive. He and the soldie exchange questioning glances. Daniel avoids eye contact with the soldiers as Anubis lea him next to the empty throne. Sari SEES Daniel. Her expression brightens. She pushes through the crowd to get nearer to the platform. Leaving Daniel's side, Anubis steps to the center of the platform, raising his arms. The entire crowd BOWS DOWN. W see a very bruised Kasuf, helped by the town Elders to hi knees in prayer. Anubis looks over to Daniel who reluctantly bows down bef the throne. The entire assembly bows and a dozen CHILDREN rush out from behind the fabric, grabbing on to poles, connected to the bottom of the material. The Children pee off to the sides, LIFTING the fabric. As it PARTS we SEE the striking image of RA, SUN GOD as h slowly steps out into the light. Again, we see him with h illusion/mask in place gold skin, elaborate headdress, et Ra takes his place on the throne. Once seated, the crowd stands, silently. Anubis stands and offers his weapon to the Pharaoh. Ra accepts it. He turns and offers it to Daniel. Anubis puts his hand roughly on Daniel's shoulder. Daniel knowing what is expected of him, is torn. Slowly he stand and accepts the weapon from Ra. Weapon in hand, Daniel tu towards the ramp. 244 245 246 247  248 249 250 251 87.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: Slowly Daniel walks past the two guards at the top of the ramp, making his way towards O'Neil and the rest of the soldiers. O'Neil looks up at Daniel as a traitor, contemp in his eye. Daniel is torn. Desperately he wants a way out of it. As he walks he SEES, Sari in the crowd. He can't look at her He turns back to the faces of the Soldiers as he approach Daniel stops a few feet in front of O'Neil who only stare at him, harshly. Daniel turns, looks back to Ra who only stares at him emotionlessly. He sees Anubis waiting next Ra, the two Horus guards at the top of the Ramp, and look up...

dialogues.speaker: THE WINGED GLIDERS 249
dialogues.text: Their weapons slowly EXTENDING, taking aim, ready. Suddenly a small FLASH OF LIGHT, catches his eye. He look down into the crowd and SEES...

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA 250
dialogues.text: Moving near Sari below, next to the ramp. He holds O'Neil lighter, reflecting sunlight off of it at Daniel to get h attention. That accomplished, Skaara peels back part of h clothing exposing...

dialogues.speaker: ONE OF THE SOLDIER'S RIFLES 251
dialogues.text: Retrieved from the base camp, Skaara holds the gun close his chest. Skaara gives Daniel a nod. Daniel looks down t the other side of the ramp and recognizes two OTHER Sheph boys, waiting. Daniel turns back to O'Neil as he lifts the weapon, COCKI it, ready to FIRE. Suddenly Daniel SPINS, and FIRES the weapon at the top of the ramp. A huge CHUNK of the ramp EXPLODES before the two guards, blocking their view of Daniel. Suddenly Skaara DRAWS the rifle and begins FIRING INTO TH AIR. Quickly we SEE, Shepherd boys, scattered everywhere, drawing weapons and FIRING. The crowd panics, no one knows which way to run. Pandemon Seizing the opportunity, Daniel and O'Neil JUMP off the r in one direction, as the other soldiers LEAP off the othe side. HORUS (#1) steps through the smoke and FIRES his weapon, HITTING Freeman as he leaps.  252 253 254 255 256 257

He SCREAMS and dies before he can hit the ground. On the opposite side, O'Neil and Daniel rush over to Sari and Skaara. They both toss SHAWLS over them, disguising them. Quickly they PUSH them into the crowd. Kawalsky and Feretti turn back towards Freeman's body whe the shepherd boys RUSH over to them, tossing CLOTH over t soldiers. Quickly they rush them into the mayhem of the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: ANUBIS 252
dialogues.text: Signals to the Gliders.

dialogues.speaker: GLIDERS 253
dialogues.text: The Gliders readjust and DIVE down over the crowd, search

dialogues.speaker: CROWD 254
dialogues.text: Quickly we SAIL overhead, staring down as everyone races away in different directions. Disguised, the soldiers can be seen within the mob. Ra stands, furious. Anubis moves close but Ra shoves him aside as he storms through the hanging fabric, back into pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND O'NEIL 255
dialogues.text: Skaara and Sari lead Daniel and O'Neil over to the Mastad who lets out a ROAR. Skaara shows O'Neil where to GRIP th Mastadge at the side of the harness. Sari shows Daniel th same on the other side. Daniel turns to thank Sari just as Skaara GRABS THE MASTA EAR. The Mastadge REAR UP and race away, dragging Daniel and O'Neil with them.

dialogues.speaker: DUNE 256
dialogues.text: People rushing off around them, Skaara and Sari climb the top of the dune to see the Mastadge far off, racing over dunes. They turn back and see...

dialogues.speaker: THE GLIDERS 257
dialogues.text: Soaring past them, giving chase, the Gliders head off int the desert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a mad tantrum, Ra storms through his palace, furious. RIPS the hanging fabrics as he marches into his private chamber .  258 259 260 261 262 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holding on for dear life, O'Neil tightly grips the harnes He looks back and sees the Gliders, speeding towards them O'Neil slaps at the side of the Mastadge.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (yelling) How do you make this stupid thing go faster! Barely holding on, Daniel PULLS himself up and GRABS onto the Mastadge's EAR. Again, the Mastadge KICKS UP speed, racing over the dunes

dialogues.speaker: GLIDER AND DUNES 259
dialogues.text: Though the Mastadge has picked up speed, he's no match fo the Gliders who narrow the gap. The Gliders FIRE a power burst at the Mastadge. Missing, the power burst EXPLODES into the sand, a few fe in front of the Mastadge. Startled, the Mastadge REARS UP and takes off in another direction.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL 260
dialogues.text: He looks back, seeing the Gliders approach. He looks ahea

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (yelling) It's no use. When we're over the next dune. We drop!

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Drop?

dialogues.speaker: GLIDERS 261
dialogues.text: Racing towards us. As they look down, they see the Mastad ahead of them, disappearing over the dune.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER SIDE OF DUNE 262
dialogues.text: Tumbling down the dune, the Mastadge galloping ahead, Dan and O'Neil roll to a stop. Instantly O'Neil starts to BUR HIMSELF in the sand. Picking up the cue, Daniel copies O'Neil, throwing sand over himself. Behind them we SEE the Gliders, heading this way. Can the bury themselves in time?  263 264 265 266 267 268 90.

dialogues.speaker: GLIDERS 263
dialogues.text: The Gliders SWOOP DOWN but just as they clear the sand hi They find the Mastadge on the other side, but O'Neil and Daniel are GONE! The Gliders circle the area, but O'Neil and Daniel are no to be seen. The Gliders circle one more time. Seeing nothing, they turn and head back.

dialogues.speaker: SAND
dialogues.text: Just as the Gliders pass overhead, disappearing over the dune, O'Neil's and Daniel's heads POP OUT of the sand. Quickly O'Neil climbs the dune, watching the Gliders depa as Daniel spits out sand, climbing after him.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: You think they'1l come back?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Why should they? In an hour we'll be buried alive. Reaching the top of the dune, Daniel turns to see what O' is talking about. He SEES...

dialogues.speaker: A SAND STORM 265
dialogues.text: Moving quickly, a sand storm heads right this way. O'Neil and Daniel are in the middle of nowhere. No escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two winged Gliders sail towards the Glider bay openin in the pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two Horus pilots march down the hall. As they pass a hanging tapestry, we SEE their silhouetted bird images MO down to their normal selves. As they pass the tapestry, w recognize one as the North African guard (Horus #1) and H #2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra sits, seething with humiliation and anger. Anguished, sits privately when he's suddenly TUGGED by a YOUNG BOY ( years old) who tries to get his attention. Furious at the invasion, Ra SPINS and GLARES at the boy, eyes filled with rage. Terrified, the boy recoils. Ra sto himself just as he looks up and SEES..
The other children standing in the doorway, watching frightened. Ra marches through them, knocking them aside he passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seething with anger, Ra quickly marches into the room onl to find Anubis with the two Horus pilots who kneel, await his arrival. Ra stops, calms himself and sits on his thro before them.

dialogues.speaker: HORUS
dialogues.text: (subtitled) They are dead. Ra slowly leans forward. The children arrive and gather round Ra's throne.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Bring their bodies to me.

dialogues.speaker: HORUS
dialogues.text: (subtitled) We lost them in the sand storm. Surely they will be killed. Ra boils, holding in his anger. He stands and walks over a box of jewelry. Hiding it from the others, Ra takes out GOLDEN RING AND DISK; the ring fitting over his finger, t attached disk hid in the palm of his hand. Turning back Ra moves slowly towards Horus #2, motioning with his other hand for Horus #2 to stand. He does, sensi something is not right. Slowly Horus #1 backs away. The children exchange nervous glances. Horus #2 starts to get nervous, looking around the room. looks back to Ra who only smiles, reassuringly; everythin alright. Horus #2 seems to calm down. Ra lifts his hand as though to gently embrace his face wh suddenly he OPENS his palm exposing the DISK. Horus #2's eyes go wide with fear but before he can react.. The disk ACTIVATES. Horus #2 suddenly begins to SHAKE VIOLENTLY, h features begin to DISTORT. He SCREAMS OUT IN PAIN. Ra watches this torture emotionlessly, waiting for his victi to expire. He does. As he drops to the floor, Ra turns to the group of childr who stare back at him frightened. Ra motions for the OLDE BOY to step forward. Ra reaches down and removes a HEAD CLAMP from the dead bo of Horus #2, placing it over the head of the Oldest Boy.  269 270 271 92. Quickly the HAWK-LIKE head APPEARS over the Oldest Boy as now takes his turn at guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil and Daniel are fighting their way through the thic whirling sands, holding onto the side of the Mastadge who pushes onward through the storm. They try to shield themselves at the side of the Mastadge but it does little to help. Movement becomes more and mor difficult. Daniel suddenly drops to his knees. The Mastadge turns back and sees Daniel getting buried in the sand and ROARS OUT. O'Neil lifts his arm holding it over his eyes. He, too, drops down, losing consciousness. The harsh winds quickly begin to bury the men in sand. Unaffected by the storm, the Mastadge watches them, unabl to help. Suddenly through the blurry sands we SEE several SHAPES apparently coming UP FROM THE SAND. The figures GRAB onto O'Neil, shaking him. Snapping out of it O'Neil squints up to SEE...

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA
dialogues.text: Skaara and two other boys carry O'Neil and Daniel away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the mouth of a large cave we SEE several FIGURES coming towards us through the sand clouds churning outsid Helping them out of the storm we SEE Skaara and two boys bringing Daniel and O'Neil inside. Once within the protective walls, O'Neil looks up and SEE the rest of the Shepherd boys wearing the army fatigues, helmets and guns they retrieved from the base camp. Leani against the wall, the weapon Ra gave Daniel. At the back of the cave he SEES Feretti, getting some aid a wound. Kawalsky turns, sees O'Neil and rushes over to him.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: You made it! Sari walks in from the opposite side, looking for Daniel. Daniel begins to cough, only semi-conscious as he's helpe inside. Sari runs over to him, bringing him some water. Realizing it's her, Daniel smiles.  93.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (re: the kids) What do you think, Colonel? It's not exactly Special Forces but they're obviously eager to join up. O'Neil looks sad. He walks away.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Take the guns away from them Lieutenant before they hurt themselves.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Sir?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: You heard me. Send them home. Daniel looks up, his head clearing.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: There's nowhere for them to go. They were seen helping us. They'll be hunted down and killed.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: We could sure use the help, Sir. O'Neil spins back to Kawalsky, suddenly furious.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (exploding) We've already lost four highly trained men! Now you hand me a bunch of kids?!

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: But, Sir, they saved our lives?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: For what!? To do what?

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: (unsure) To help us get back home. O'Neil looks at Kawalsky sadly. He turns and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Why don't you tell 'em the truth?

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Truth?  94.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (to O'Neil) Tell them why you planted a nuclear bomb next to the StarGate.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: What's he talking about, Colonel? O'Neil doesn't answer. Finally...

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: (calm) My orders were simple. Cross the bridge, hold the bridge, and at the first sign of danger, destroy the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Why didn't you tell us?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: It was strictly "need to know."

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Need to know? Need to know? I think that's something I'd need to know!

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Do you realize what you've started? Tomorrow, when they send off the next delivery of quartz, Ra's going to send them your Goddamned bomb.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Send who?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Who do you think? Someone put him in charge of all this. We're talking about a highly advanced, oppressive and hostile culture who use people like we use cattle. We were no threat to them. They wrote us off thousands of years ago. How do you think they're going to react when they find out what we've become?! O'Neil stands, considering his options. Sari and the Shep boys stare at the argument, confused.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Then we'll have to be there before they can send it through. We get back the device, I can destroy the StarGate.  272 95. Trying to talk some sense to O'Neil, Daniel walks over to him. Frustrated, Daniel gets angry.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Destroying this one gate won't accomplish anything! There are bound to be more.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: You have a better idea?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: We've got to get back home and dismantle the gate on our side. Then hope they leave us alone.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Well, thanks to you, we don't have that option. (turning back to his men) Lieutenant, we leave this place at first light. O'Neil marches out into another part of the cave. Feretti who's been silent...

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: Great. A suicide mission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Staring off, O'Neil stands alone in the middle of this ca Across from him we can see the storm raging outside.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You realize, if you go through with this, a lot of innocent people will be killed. O'Neil doesn't answer, keeping his back to Daniel who sta at the back of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You were right you know. I only cared about saving my reputation. (beat) I'm sorry I lied.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Doesn't matter anymore. There's a silent moment, but something Daniel has to ask.  273 96.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: You knew from the beginning that you'd have to destroy the gate, didn't you?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: "Sealed and buried for all time." That's how it translated, right? Why would they bury it? Think? It was a warning. Daniel realizes he's right. How could he have been so bli

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I don't understand. If you knew, how could you take this assignment? You have a family? A son? O'Neil stares off with the same distant look he had on wh we first saw him.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: I had a family. Realizing, Daniel is moved. He offers...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I know what it's like to lose someone you love.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: No one should ever have to outlive their own child. It just isn't right. Suddenly Skaara appears behind them carrying a bowl of fo he holds out for O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA
dialogues.text: Anaasar? O'Neil doesn't even look at him. He just walks away, over to the edge of the cave, staring out into the night. Skaa afraid he said something wrong turns to Daniel. Daniel ca face him and walks out. Skaara considers a second, sniffs at the food to make sur it's okay, then walks over to O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL 273
dialogues.text: O'Neil sits at the edge of the cave, his mind a million l years away. Skaara walks up alongside him.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA
dialogues.text: Anaasar.  274 275 97. Still O'Neil ignores him. Slowly Skaara slides the plate food in front of O'Neil's face as you would do to a reluc child. Finally O'Neil turns and sees Skaara's smiling fac

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Nakdes Anaasar.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Anaasar, right. Uncomfortable, O'Neil reluctantly takes the bowl from Ska who promptly sits down next to him. O'Neil begins to eat Skaara smiles proudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel slowly walks back inside, troubled. He turns a cor of the cave where Kawalsky and Feretti are conferring wit each other. But as Daniel nears, they suddenly become qui giving Daniel the "cold shoulder."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel enters. He sees several of the Shepherd boys surrounding Sari who prepares food for them. As Sari stok the flames below her cooking pot, Daniel walks up and ser some food to one of the waiting Shepherd boys. The boy stares at Daniel, shocked, then starts to giggle. Even Sari looks up, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: What? Even Sari suppresses a laugh, turning away from him.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Why are they laughing? Sari takes the serving bowl from him and walks over to Kawalsky and Feretti, feeding them. The boys continue to chuckle at Daniel's expense. Daniel doesn't understand.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled; to boys) Why do you laugh? This just makes them laugh more. Finally one BOY (#2) tur and answers.

dialogues.speaker: BOY
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Husbands do not do this work. Daniel is completely taken off guard.  276 277 98.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Husband? Sari walks back over and Daniel turns to her.
