dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) He called me your "husband." Suddenly filled with embarrassment, Sari hurries away. Ag the boys titter with laughter. Daniel walks over to Sari the back of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) What is it? Again, Sari is ashamed. She won't look Daniel in the eye. Skaara enters, sees the boys giggling, peering around the corner of the cave, spying on Daniel and Sari.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND SARI 276
dialogues.text: Very close together, Daniel reaches over, touching Sari's shoulder. Skaara, seeing this, turns and SHOOS the boys away, giving Daniel and Sari some privacy.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND SARI 277
dialogues.text: Still avoiding his eyes, Sari finally speaks to Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: (subtitled) I'm sorry. Don't be angry with me. I didn't tell them.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Tell them what?

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: (subtitled) That you did not want me. Sari turns away, shamed. Daniel realizes she's referring when she was brought to him in Nagada. He slowly turns her back towards him. Gently he leans clo and kisses her. Their lips part and Sari looks up at Daniel, searching hi emotions. Slowly she moves back to him. Again, they kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes fluttering open, Daniel wakes to see Sari curled alongside of him. Daniel smiles sadly. He turns, only to find, a young Shepherd boy sleeping behind him. As Daniel sits up he finds, all the Shepherd boys have ta sleeping positions all around him and Sari. Daniel shakes his head in disbelief. Suddenly something catches his eye near the front of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: Skaara sits by a dying fire, working on some drawings he scratches into the wall. Curious, Daniel stands and start to walk over to him. Imitating the drawings seen earlier in the catacombs, Ska chalks up the wall of the cave with primitive sketches. Pleased, Daniel smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0O.V.
dialogues.text: A simple set of drawings detailing the rescue in front of the pyramid. We see figures of the boys firing their guns and the soldiers in front of the pyramid, the three suns surrounding it. Suddenly Daniel's expression changes. Slowly he gets up a moves closer to the sketches.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: We slowly PUSH IN to the drawing of the team before the pyramid, ZOOMING IN to the top part of the drawing; the pyramid with three suns, one above, the other two on each side.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: My God. The point of origin. Quickly Daniel moves close to the drawing. He takes the burnt charcoal from Skaara and traces over the sketch. As he did in the silo when detailing the symbol for Earth, h outlines a symbol over the drawing of the pyramid and sun

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Can't believe what? Daniel spins to find Kawalsky approaching, wiping the sle from his eyes.  100.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I found it.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: The seventh sign. Our ticket home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several decorated Mastadges are lined up at the rim of th mining pit. A single winged Glider hovering above.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA AND YOUNGEST BOY 283
dialogues.text: Peering through some rocks a distance away, the boys see caravan being put together. Skaara nods to the youngest boy. They turn and sneak away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil is confronting Daniel, packing weapons into his pa

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: It's too risky. We won't have the time to get everyone through. We'll have to take fast and immediate action.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: We can't just turn our backs on them.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: We don't have any choice! All we can do is try and complete our mission. Suddenly Feretti steps up.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: Sir, we owe our lives to them.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Forget it! I have my orders. O'Neil reaches for his rifle. Kawalsky grabs it first, holding it firm. He leans close to O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Then disobey those orders.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: No. Daniel is right. We won't accomplish anything unless we tear down the gate back home on Earth. These kids are our best chance. Daniel looks at Kawalsky, surprised and impressed. O'Neil knows he's outnumbered. Suddenly Skaara rushes in. He blu something out to Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Colonel, are you with us or not? Everyone turns to O'Neil for his decision. Finally...

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: It better work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A caravan of four Mastadges have been assembled at the to of the dune next to a nearby mining pit. An obelisk marks the spot.

dialogues.speaker: PIT 286
dialogues.text: Workers climb the ladders burdened with heavy bags of qua Horus (#1) stands watch over them as they make their way the dune. One WORKER falls to his knees from heat exhaustion. Horus turns and SCREAMS at the Worker to continue. The Worker tries to get to his feet but can't. Again, he collapses. Barking out commands, Horus marches over to the Worker an KICKS him, savagely. He tries to stand but Horus KICKS hi again. As he moves in for the kill, the Worker suddenly pulls off his hood, revealing...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL 287
dialogues.text: Before Horus can lift his weapon, he comes face to face w the nasty end of the weapon Ra gave Daniel. Daniel COCKS OPEN, ready to fire. Instantaneously all the surrounding workers whip out WEAP aimed right at Horus. They POP their hoods off, revealing Sari, the soldiers and Shepherd boys.

dialogues.speaker: MINING AREA 288
dialogues.text: All around the workers STOP and turn, shocked. Kasuf, overseeing the caravan, looks over, horrified.  102.

dialogues.speaker: PIT
dialogues.text: Kawalsky wrestles the weapon away from Horus as Daniel ge to his feet. Daniel and Kawalsky keep their weapons aimed at Horus as Feretti begins to tie him up.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Let's get going. O'Neil signals Skaara and the boys who turn and move up t hill to take over the caravan. But suddenly Kasuf, surrou by the Elders, leads a group of workers over to block the path of the Shepherd boys. Kasuf YELLS out to them, harshly. Their route blocked, a stand off, Skaara turns back to O'Neil for guidance. Distracted, Daniel turns around.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What's he saying?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (concerned) He won't let them pass. He says they'll bring misery to all the people..warning them not to go against the Gods. O'Neil steps forward, LIFTING his weapon. The soldiers an Shepherd boys turn to O'Neil. They can't believe he might really kill these unarmed people.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Out of our way. Coolly O'Neil takes aim, cocking his rifle. Suddenly Dani yells.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: No. Wait. Daniel turns and touches the button on Horus' collar, the Hawk illusion VANISHES. The workers are STUNNED. Horus, humiliated, seethes. Daniel turns and moves back towards Kasuf.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Take a look at your Gods! Suddenly Horus KNOCKS Feretti away, his hands freed. He grabs back his weapon from Kawalsky, SLAMMING it into him he turns towards the unsuspecting Daniel. Seeing this, Sa screams.  290 291 292 293 294 103.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Dan-el! Daniel spins back just in time to see Horus LIFTING the weapon, ready to fire. Without time to think, Daniel lift the weapon and FIRES. Horus is BLOWN BACK, off his feet. He SLAMS back down, in the sand, dead. Kasuf and the workers stare in disbelief. Slowly they inch their way towards Horus. Daniel stands there, frozen. He's never killed a man befo and can't believe he just has.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Well, what are we waiting for? Slowly Sari walks over to him, easing Daniel's weapon dow She and Kawalsky slowly turn Daniel back and escort him u the hill towards the caravan. Kasuf and the workers push past them, moving closer to Horus.

dialogues.speaker: HORUS
dialogues.text: Stone cold dead, a trickle of blood runs out his mouth. T workers stare at him, completely shocked. Kasuf turns just in time to watch the caravan disappear o the dunes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking out over the desert, Ra scans the horizon. Gently he strokes a black cat curled over his arm.

dialogues.speaker: RA'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: Climbing over the dunes we SEE the caravan making its way towards the pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra turns back from the window and signals two Horus who m over to a large silver platter. On the platter we SEE som of the soldier's weapons, books, equipment and especially the disassembled NUCLEAR DEVICE. They lift the platter and Ra watches them leave the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two Horus march over to the medallion carrying the si platter, the circular door sliding shut behind them. 290 291 292 293 294  295 296 297 298 299 300 104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The caravan makes its way over the last dune heading towa the entrance to the pyramid. The team walks with hoods covering their heads, identities hidden.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We HEAR the medallion ignite, its lights flooding the roo The sound disappears as the two Horus guards march over t the StarGate, placing the platter down in front of it. They turn and march towards the pyramid entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first cart arrives at the base of the ramp and Skaara unties Daniel's Mastadge, pulling it aside. Skaara waves the cart ahead. The cart is PULLED up the st by its SIX workers. As the cart slowly crawls up the ramp, the two Horus guar appear at the entrance door, waiting. Separated from Daniel, the Mastadge below MOANS, tugging its restraints trying to follow the cart. Skaara struggle to calm the animal. Frightened of being given away, none of the workers react the Mastadge. Heads bowed, they continue to PUSH the cart A second cart follows the first up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: Towering above them, Ra stands out on his balcony, lookin down at the carts below.

dialogues.speaker: HORUS GUARDS 299
dialogues.text: Horus #3 glances down at Skaara, suspicious. The first ca reaches the top of the stairs. Suddenly Horus BARKS out a command, stopping the cart. Skaara looks up worriedly. The Mastadge MOANING. Horus walks slowly around the first cart, all the workers keeping their heads bowed. Finally, he waves it through.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA 300
dialogues.text: breathes a sigh of relief and looks over to Kawalsky and Feretti who peer out from beneath their hoods. But when t cart disappears through the door the Mastadge HOWLS.  301 302 303 304 105. Horus #3 shoots a look back down at the Mastadge. The fir cart clears the doorway and enters the pyramid when sudde Horus signals his guards who FOLLOW IT inside.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: Once they enter below, Ra reaches over, touching a contro panel in the wall next to him. He PUSHES a small button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a huge STONE door begins to SLIDE DOWN, SEALING the entrance. As the door SHUTS Skaara looks up, frighten Feretti turns to Kawalsky, panicked.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: (hushed) What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the huge entrance door SLAMS SHUT the two Horus guards surround the cart. A third Horus (#4) enters from behind. Horus #3 BARKS out a command but no one moves. Horus #2 walks over to the workers. Is it Daniel? He PULLS down th first hood revealing a frightened SHEPHERD BOY. Horus #2 THROWS him to the floor as he moves closer to th next worker. Horus #3, weapon trained, eyes the lot with suspicion as partner nears the next in line. He reaches up and PULLS DOWN her hood, revealing SARI, her long hair falling to h shoulders. Horus #2 is taken off guard by finding a woman. He lifts his weapon. BURSTING OUT OF THE QUARTZ PILE, Daniel and O'Neil LIFT O their WEAPONS and FIRE. At the same moment, the rest of t Shepherd boys GRAB WEAPONS and FIRE. The bullets KNOCK Horus #2 BACKWARDS, but it's Daniel's P BURST from the alien weapon that BLOWS Horus #2 to PIECES The other two FIRE BACK, taking cover behind pillars. One of the Shepherd boys is hit, goes DOWN. Daniel grabs Sari, pulling her behind the cover of the ca The Shepherd boys kneel behind cover, FIRING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the sound of the gunfire, Kawalsky RIPS a large BEAM o wood from the side of the second cart.  305 306 307 106.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: We've got to get that door back open! Feretti and the Shepherd boys help him JAM the wood under the door, trying to LIFT the huge entrance door. It doesn budge.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: Ra watches the panic below, an amused smile crosses his l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guards lay down tremendous FIRE POWER, blowing chunks out of the walls, RIPPING into the cart. Another of the Shepherd boys takes a shot, falling to the floor, injured O'Neil DASHES from his position moving behind another pil Separated, Daniel turns and SEES a path to the hallway is clear. Crawling low, one of the Guards makes his way around the side of the room. He peers out from his position and SEES

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL 307
dialogues.text: His back to him, Daniel is a clear target. The guard rais his weapon and takes aim. Sari, following him, SEES the guard leaning out from behi a pillar. She SCREAMS OUT and tries to PUSH Daniel out of harm's way. Daniel turns slowly towards her just as the guard FIRES. Sari STEPS IN THE WAY, taking the SHOT inten for Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: No! As Sari falls, Daniel spins and FIRES, BLOWING THE GUARD AWAY. Daniel reaches down cradling Sari. She stares up at Daniel, the life slowly leaving her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sari! No. Suddenly the door leading to the grand gallery and StarGa begins to CLOSE. Pinned down at the opposite end of the Hall, O'Neil sees this and yells across to Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Jackson, get to the gate! Daniel looks up, SEES the door closing.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jackson!  308

dialogues.speaker: 308D
dialogues.text: 309 310 107. Daniel lifts Sari in his arms. Seeing Daniel MOVE O'Neil steps out and FIRES, laying down cover. At the last possi moment before the door seals, Daniel makes it inside leav O'Neil behind, trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skaara leads three other boys around the side of the pyra over to the window. Skaara climbs up, looks inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil steps out from behind a column and FIRES. He SEES Skaara looking in from the window. O'Neil waves Skaara aw

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Go! Get out of here! Go home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About to crawl inside, Skaara looks up and SEES two GLIDE coming from around this side of the pyramid. Suddenly one of them FIRES. Skaara LEAPS out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil looks back up just as an EXPLOSION rips up the win where Skaara had been. Thinking Skaara has been killed, O'Neil steps out FIRING MADLY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skaara and the boys have to RACE for cover and the sand explodes around them, the Gliders overhead.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY AND FERETTI 309
dialogues.text: As they try and lift, the wood beams SPLINTER under the weight. Suddenly another TWO GLIDERS come from around the other direction, FIRING at the platform. The soldiers and Shepherd boys SCATTER as the now FOUR GL begin to bombard the front of the pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: Watching the mayhem below, Ra turns and nods to Anubis ac the room. Anubis bows and exits. Turning the opposite direction, Ra leaves. As he passes, the children quickly move over to the windo Confused and frightened, the children stare down at the a below.  311 312 313 108.

dialogues.speaker: SAME 311
dialogues.text: The door at the top of the gallery is CLOSING. Quickly we RACE towards it, running full speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sari in his arms, Daniel just makes it inside as the door behind him SLAMS DOWN, sealing the room. Exhausted and ou of breath, Daniel drops to his knees before the StarGate holding Sari tightly.

dialogues.speaker: SARI
dialogues.text: Dan-el? Daniel looks down to Sari who smiles up at him tenderly. Gently her eyes roll back as her life leaves her. She die in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Sari...! But it's too late. Stunned, he stands there, just a few feet away from the StarGate. So close. Tears well in his eyes. Suddenly behind him, the medallion begins to ACTIVATE, th laser beginning its trace around the perimeter. Daniel ha to make a decision; save himself or take a gigantic chanc for Sari. He decides. Quickly he STEPS ONTO THE MEDALLION just before the laser seals the perimeter. As the laser completes its cylinder SEE a piece of Sari's dress get CAUGHT outside the cylind The cloth is SEVERED. Gently it sails to the floor. We FOLLOW the cloth to the ground. Behind it we SEE the last of Daniel's image disappear, a GUARD'S FOOT taking h place. The foot walks off the medallion stepping on the cloth. We PAN UP to reveal ANUBIS. The doors leading out re-open and Anubis makes his way towards the entrance hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the guards steps out from behind one of the pillars when BLAM, he gets blasted by O'Neil. O'Neil rush over to one of the fallen Shepherd boys. Too late, he's gone. Frustrated O'Neil moves to the closed front door, searching for something that could open it. Nothing. Suddenly, behind him, the door to the ground gallery begi to LIFT OPEN. O'Neil dashes for the cover of a pillar as Anubis slowly makes his way into the room.  314 315 109.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An EXPLOSION rips up the sand as the four Gliders STRAFE from above. The Shepherd boys rush for cover all over the front of the entrance, separated. Racing down the ramp another EXPLOSION HITS, ripping up t stairs killing one of the Shepherd boys. Skaara FIRES his rifle at the passing Gliders as he reaches the sand. At the side of the platform, Kawalsky and Feretti take co at the side of the closed door.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: We're getting slaughtered out here. We've got to do something. Kawalsky SEES one of the carts standing between the obeli Suddenly Kawalsky TAKES OFF RUNNING.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kawalsky! But Kawalsky keeps going. Two GLIDERS BANK, spotting him. As Kawalsky runs down the ramp, the Gliders DIVE shooting him, ripping up the rampway. Kawalsky, nearly hit, keeps going. Feretti sees Kawalsky heading towards one of the fallen c Taking cue, Feretti RUNS out after him. Heroically, Kawal LIFTS up the re-enforced bottom of the cart, dragging it back towards another cart, the sand EXPLODING around him. Skaara rushes over to help. Kawalsky and Feretti turn ove the carts, making a small fortress between the obelisks. Skaara WAVES for the others to come and take cover. The other boys DASH out from their positions, racing for cover of the toppled carts, POWER BURSTS blasting all ove Skaara screams out for the last of the Shepherd boys who RUNS, full speed. Just before he gets there, BLAST, he's knocked off his feet, laying sprawled out over the sand. Devastated, Skaara stares at his fallen friend. Kawalsky SEES this and eases Skaara back down below the safety of barricade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carrying Sari, Daniel walks into the sarcophagus room. He lays Sari's lifeless body down in the open sarcophagus. A he steps back the sarcophagus slowly CLOSES around her. Overcome with emotion, Daniel moves back, waiting, helple  316 317

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Opening his jewelry box, Ra retrieves the ring and disk h used to dispose his guard. Slowly he places it over his finger, adjusting the disk in the palm of his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anubis stands over two of his fallen comrades. He lifts h weapon, scanning the area. Suddenly he SEES O'Neil, layin on the ground. Anubis kicks the body, nothing. Just as Anubis is about to move on, TRIP, O'Neil GRABS his leg. Anubis hits the floor, HARD. O'Neil LEAPS on top of him, hitting the button on Anubis' collar. The protective mask VANISHES. And PUNCH, O'Neil slams his fist into Anubis' face, knock him unconscious. O'Neil quickly gets up and takes off run for the StarGate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four Gliders are circling above, BOMBARDING the barri below. The Shepherd boys are ducked down as Kawalsky turn to Feretti.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: We've got to concentrate all our firepower at the same target. Just then one of the GLIDERS swoops down from over the entrance, straight towards him. Kawalsky points to the Glider. The Shepherd boys understand and they all lift th weapons at the same time. As the Glider DIVES DOWN, Kawalsky, Feretti, Skaara and t boys all STAND and OPEN FIRE.

dialogues.speaker: GLIDER 317B
dialogues.text: A BARRAGE of bullets SLAM into the Glider. It SWERVES wil its wing SMASHING into the top of the obelisk. The Glider SPINS out of control, disappearing over the dune. In a gigantic FIREBALL, the Glider EXPLODES as it crashes behind the dune. The Shepherd boys CHEER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the doorway, we SEE Daniel stepping backwards. In the foreground we SEE Ra step into view. Surprised to see Daniel, Ra watches Daniel for a moment, fascinated.  319 320 141.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel waits, helpless as Ra enters. Slowly Ra encircles him, studying him. Daniel tries to keep his distance as R moves around him. Suddenly Ra stops, a puzzled look on hi face.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Why? Why would you come here now? Slowly Ra turns away from Daniel, looking over at his sarcophagus. When he looks back and sees the frightened look on Daniel's face, he realizes he's hit it. Slowly he moves towards the sarcophagus. Daniel RUNS towards him to stop him. He LUNGES at Ra, but SLAMS into the invisible shield, falling backwards. Ra st looks back to Daniel through the rippling waves of his sh superior and unstoppable. As Daniel tries to recover he SEES, Ra running his hand o the sarcophagus.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: No! The sarcophagus slowly OPENS revealing Sari. Ra turns bac to Daniel, surprised and intrigued.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) How romantic. As Ra moves back towards Daniel we SEE Sari's eyes flutte open. Not yet fully healed, yet life restored.

dialogues.speaker: RA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) You will die together. Menacingly, Ra makes his way closer to Daniel. Slowly he LIFTS his hand, exposing the DISK in his palm. Gracefully he PUSHES through the shield, his hand moving towards Dan who stumbles backward as he retreats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil rushes into the room, looking around for Daniel. H SEES a puddle of blood on the floor, leading over to the medallion, Sari's torn cloth laying next to it. O'Neil believes Daniel is lost. Suddenly O'Neil SEES something across the room.  321 322 323 324 112.

dialogues.speaker: SILVER TRAY 321
dialogues.text: At the side of the room, the silver tray with the soldier equipment and the DISMANTLED BOMB. His opportunity before him, O'Neil is torn; complete his mission and re-assemble the bomb or wait for the others. doesn't know what to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel is backing away as Ra keeps moving towards him, unrelenting. As Daniel retreats he looks down and SEES...

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.0.V.
dialogues.text: At Ra's feet Daniel sees four small pyramids which float inch above the ground, creating the shield. The floor is exposed. Daniel gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Please, don't hurt her. Please. Suddenly Daniel drops down, bowing before Ra.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Too late for that. Daniel peeks up from the floor just in time to SEE Ra wal across the thin fabric which hangs down from the walls. Ra's feet crush over the fine cloth as he steps over, cle the shield does not cover the ground. Seizing the moment, Daniel quickly GRABS at the fabric an RUNS towards the sarcophagus. As he MOVES the fabric WRAP around Ra's ankles. As Ra spins to follow, he trips up. H and his shield TUMBLE to the floor. Daniel leaps to his feet. He races to Sari's side, liftin her out of the sarcophagus and rushing out of the room. Through the rippling waves of his shield we SEE Ra, seeth with anger. Slowly he gets back to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The numbers of the Shepherd boys are dwindling from the intense BOMBING from the remaining three Gliders. As anot Glider makes a PASS, again Kawalsky leads the boys to FIR Suddenly, Skaara runs out of ammunition. Quickly, weapons begin to CLICK, empty all around him. Slowly Kawalsky and Feretti run out of ammunition as well The Glider passes over and BLASTS into the barricade.  325 326 327 328 329 330 113. Several other Shepherd boys are injured.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: Damn it!

dialogues.speaker: THE GLIDERS 325
dialogues.text: break formation, banking away from the fortification. At first they're hopeful that the battle is over. They are quickly deflated when they SEE... Not too far away, the Gliders LAND on the dunes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just as O'Neil kneels down next to the dismantled bomb, A appears at the doorway. Anubis COCKS the weapon open. Just as he FIRES, O'Neil LI the silver platter, using it as a SHIELD. It DEFLECTS the power burst, bending it in half. O'Neil FLINGS the tray at Anubis and CHARGES, SLAMMING hi against the wall, his weapon dropping. Locked in mortal combat, the two warriors struggle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Gliders have landed on top of the dunes. One of the Guards, YELLS OUT, commanding a surrender. Slowly some of the Shepherd boys climb out from behind th toppled carts, throwing their weapons aside. Skaara tries to stop them as they leave. Even Feretti bows his head in defeat as Kawalsky chucks h weapon away in frustration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sari in his arms, Daniel rushes across the room over to t medallion. Frightened, Daniel searches for some way to tu it on. As Daniel looks up he SEES...

dialogues.speaker: RA 329
dialogues.text: Marching straight towards Daniel and Sari. Coming closer, closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil and Anubis are locked in mortal combat. Anubis wit the upper hand gets on top of O'Neil, pummeling him with savage blows to the head. O'Neil, pinned.  331 332 333 334 335 114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra has reached Daniel and Sari. Slowly he LIFTS his hand and PUSHES through his shield, exposing it to Daniel. He moves his hand close to Daniel's head.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) I am no longer amused. Behind him we SEE the children arrive, watching helplessl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anubis swings, O'Neil catching his hand. Suddenly he MONK FLIPS Anubis OVER his head, sending him sprawling. Anubis rolls to a stop at the edge of the Medallion, his HEAD la ONTO THE MEDALLION'S SURFACE. O'Neil LEAPS on top of him, pinning him down. Anubis grab for his weapon. O'Neil SLAMS Anubis' arm back to the floo As Anubis' wrist device hits the floor, the medallion sud ACTIVATES, the laser beginning to form the cylinder. O'Neil is shocked. Realizing, he holds Anubis down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra lifts his hand above Daniel. His head begins to DISTOR particles SHIFTING. Daniel SCREAMS OUT in agony. Suddenly the LASER begins to form the cylinder around the medallio Through his pain, Daniel SEES this and GRABS RA'S WRIST. With his foot against the base of Ra's shield, he keeps R off the medallion while holding his arm inside. With every bit of strength Daniel can gather, he holds ti through his torture. The laser encircles the medallion, sealing. Unable to pull free, RA'S HAND IS CAUGHT IN THE CYLINDER. His eyes go wide with panic. Suddenly the BEAM ACTIVATES. Ra SCREAMS OUT as his hand is severed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil's eyes go wide as he SEES... The cylinder SEALS UP SEVERING ANUBIS' HEAD. O'Neil jumps back away from the headless body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel looks up at the shocked Ra as he, Sari and RA'S HA are BEAMED downward. Just as they disappear, the HEAD OF ANUBIS, arrives in their place. Ra can't believe his eyes  336 337 338 339 340 341 342 115. Clutching his severed wrist, Ra SCREAMS OUT in terrible p and frustration. He turns towards the children, yelling a them to come. Frightened, they back away from him. Furious, Ra STORMS past them, clutching at his wrist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O'Neil looks over to see the unconscious Daniel and Sari laying on the medallion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the three guards approach, weapons aimed, Skaara turns Kawalsky for help. Kawalsky knows all is lost and raises his hands in surrender. Feretti does the same. The boys, reluctantly follow their lead. Slowly they come out from behind their barricade, surrendering.

dialogues.speaker: DUNES
dialogues.text: Just as they are about to reach the Guards, a LONE CRY is heard off in the distance. The Guards look around when suddenly Kasuf APPEARS at the top of the dunes. He lifts his arms and SCREAMS OUT a COMMAND. Suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE
dialogues.text: Appearing at the top of every dune. The Guards turn just Kasuf SCREAMS OUT a BATTLE CRY. Rushing over the dunes, from every direction, all the wor and townspeople run towards the Guards, SCREAMING OUT.

dialogues.speaker: KASUF
dialogues.text: leads the CHARGE. With primitive TOOLS, MINING EQUIPMENT and make-shift weapons, the people ATTACK. The Guards FIRE, killing several but they are TOTALLY OUTNUMBERED. Before they can escape they are OVERRUN, MOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shivering with PAIN, Ra moves to his sarcophagus. Suddenl the SOUND of THOUSANDS OF VOICES draws his attention. He moves over to a window behind the sarcophagus and SEES...

dialogues.speaker: OUT WINDOW
dialogues.text: His guards overrun, a riotous mob outside. Stunned, Ra ca believe what he's seeing. Furious he makes his way over t the many PEDESTALS. 336 337 338 339 340 341 342  343 344 345 346 347 348 116. Frantically he lays his one hand over many of them ina specific sequence. Suddenly the entire CRAFT begins to RUMBLE, coming to lif

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the center of the chaos, Skaara stops, listening. Soon the RUMBLE grows LOUD. Slowly everyone STOPS, turning tow the pyramid. Kawalsky and Feretti, also freeze, looking upwards. Astonished they hold back their triumph as they SEE...

dialogues.speaker: PYRAMID AND CRAFT
dialogues.text: The craft begins to FOLD UP, preparing for the launch, BL of AIR shooting from the sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel is unconscious, Sari is not much better. As she cradles him in her arms the room suddenly begins to SHAKE O'Neil gets up and bolts for the NUCLEAR DEVICE. Quickly O'Neil begins to assemble it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra's Space Craft begins to LIFT OFF. The HARSH WINDS BLOW Slowly the CRAFT leaves the pyramid, sailing upwards into the sky.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY, SKAARA AND FERETTI 347
dialogues.text: Seeing the craft retreating, they CHEER, the harsh winds kicking up the sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel begins to wake in the violent shaking of the room. Through his haziness he SEES O'Neil putting the bomb back together.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: No. With all his energy, Daniel pulls himself up, moving clos to O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No! We won! He's leaving! O'Neil CLICKS the last part of the bomb in place. A RED LIGHT turns ON at the top of the device, a COUNTER starts CLICKING DOWN. Slowly O'Neil turns back to Daniel.  117.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: And he won't be coming back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His wrist wrapped in his robe, Ra has finished the takeof sequence. His eyes filled with tears of humiliation, Ra YELLS out to the children but they do not come. Frustrate Ra moves to the edge of the doorway and CALLS OUT to the children. He turns and SEES the children have gathered onto the medallion, huddled close, fear in their eyes. Angrily, Ra yells over to them.

dialogues.speaker: RA
dialogues.text: (betrayed; subtitled) You can not leave me! Suddenly the medallion ACTIVATES, the children begin to disappear. Ra SCREAMS OUT with anger and betrayal. The children vanish. In their place Ra SEES...

dialogues.speaker: THE NUCLEAR DEVICE 350
dialogues.text: Sitting on top of the medallion is THE NUCLEAR DEVICE. The digital clock on its side reads: 6... 5... 4 Ra's eye go wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shepherd boys LOOK UP to the sky just as the craft DISAPPEARS, out of the stratosphere. At the point of disappearance, the craft is replaced with a BRILLIANT FLA OF WHITE LIGHT. Suddenly the sky IGNITES with COLORS. The ROAR of a NUCLEAR EXPLOSION.

dialogues.speaker: PYRAMID ENTRANCE 352
dialogues.text: Daniel, O'Neil and Sari emerge from the pyramid. From the top of the stairs they watch the most amazing light show ever. O'Neil and Daniel share a smile. Through the doorway behind them we SEE Ra's "children" squinting as they walk out into the daylight.

dialogues.speaker: SKAARA AND SHEPHERD BOYS 353
dialogues.text: Skaara and the Shepherd boys come rushing up to O'Neil. Kawalsky and Feretti walking up behind them. Skaara stops before him. O'Neil turns to him, waiting.  354 355 356 357 358

He lifts his hand SALUTING O'Neil. Slowly O'Neil begins t smile. One by one, the rest of the Shepherd boys SALUTE. O'Neil stands to attention. Finally he proudly lifts his hand and returns the gesture. Kawalsky and Feretti share smile.

dialogues.speaker: PEOPLE 354
dialogues.text: Below them THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE surround the base of the r

dialogues.speaker: ENTRANCE PLATFORM 355
dialogues.text: Daniel, O'Neil, Sari, Skaara and Kasuf turn towards the m below. Skaara grabs Daniel's hand and LIFTS HIS FIST into the air.

dialogues.speaker: A THOUSAND FISTS 356
dialogues.text: All at once a THOUSAND FISTS are RAISED with a loud CHEER THE BATTLE CRY repeated. Daniel is overwhelmed with emoti

dialogues.speaker: THE MASTADGE 357
dialogues.text: Pushing through the crowd, the Mastadge ROARS OUT to Dani Daniel laughs, turns to Sari and HUGS HER TIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: SURROUNDING AREA 358
dialogues.text: All the Shepherd boys, their arms lifted above their head The CHEER CONTINUES as we pull back wider and wider.

dialogues.speaker: THE STARGATE
dialogues.text: Just as the last symbol moves into place, the ring IGNITI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feretti, Kawalsky and O'Neil prepare to enter the gate. Skaara and Daniel move close. O'Neil holds his hand out f Skaara. Skaara stares at the hand for a beat. Slowly he reaches out and shakes hands with O'Neil.

dialogues.speaker: FERETTI
dialogues.text: (to Daniel) I always knew you'd get us back. Daniel smiles as Kawalsky laughs.

dialogues.speaker: KAWALSKY
dialogues.text: You sure you wanna do this?  119.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: They need me right now. I've got to stay. Daniel nods. O'Neil moves over to Daniel, shakes his hand There's an awkward pause.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: You gonna be alright?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: I'll be fine. You?

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: Yeah. I think so. Daniel reaches over and hands something to O'Neil. He loo down and sees the GOLDEN SUN DISK in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: Tell Catherine it brought me luck.

dialogues.speaker: O'NEIL
dialogues.text: I will. O'Neil turns and joins his men as they STEP THROUGH THE G disappearing. Skaara waving goodbye as they go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the three suns SETS as Daniel and Sari lead a caravan away from the pyramid over the dune. The Mastadge HOWLS out his beautiful CRY.
